titles.title: END BYOD Act
END BYOD Act
Ensuring No Devices Bear Your Own Data Act
A bill to prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from allowing IRS personnel to use a personal device, including a mobile device, to access, process, transmit, or store taxpayer information.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Ensuring No Devices Bear Your Own Data Act or the END BYOD Act
This bill prohibits Internal Revenue Service employees, contractors, or volunteers from using personal devices (e.g., smartphones, laptops) to access, process, transmit, or store any taxpayer information that is subject to restrictions on disclosure.
